attributes.additional_details: An undercover investigation has revealed a major trust issue with the way Panorama conducts itself as seen in TR undercover videos.
attributes.background: Panorama attempted to make a fake programme about Tommy Robinson and have been caught working with far left Hate not Hope to do a hatchet job on this man.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because BBC programmes are the responsiblity of the BBC which is independent of the UK Government and Parliament.

If you wish to complain to the BBC you can do do here:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/faqs/complaints_process
